summary: Encapsulates the configuration and parameter mapping for the Amazon Titan G1 model, handling conversion of generic OpenAI‑style settings to the specific Bedrock request format and translating responses back to a unified structure.
business_intent: Facilitates seamless integration of the Titan G1 embedding model into applications by providing a ready‑to‑use configuration layer that abstracts AWS Bedrock specifics while supporting familiar OpenAI parameter conventions.
